tasks.task_description: Enhance mobile app with core screens and bilingual support
Create web dashboard with analytics and real-time features
Build backend services with FastAPI and AI integration
Implement Cloudflare Workers for edge computing
Create shared packages for UI components and utilities
Add Docker configuration and deployment scripts

description: Empower and enhance SSDP Platform Structure with comprehensive implementations
context: Enhanced mobile app with bilingual support, created web dashboard components, built FastAPI services with AI forecasting, implemented Cloudflare Workers for route optimization and payments, created shared UI components and Saudi compliance utilities, added Docker Compose configuration

Successfully committed and pushed all SSDP platform enhancements to GitHub. Repository now contains complete implementation with mobile apps, web dashboard, backend services, Cloudflare Workers, shared packages, and deployment infrastructure.
